Description: I purchased this guitar in Japan. I had the pick of the litter. There were prettier guitars but none that played nicer or better. There are tiny scratches on the back, and a couple slight dings on the front (PLEASE LOOK AT THE PICTURES) but nothing is bad. This guitar plays like a real '59 Les Paul and can be sweet and can be growly with the turn of a volume knob. If you know Tokai guitars, you know the Hibiki models were contracted to get as close to an orignial '59 Les Paul as possible. Tokai spared no expense pursuing this goal. This guitar is as good as any modern 59 Les Paul you can name. Weighs just a hair under 9 pounds according to my scale. This is a translation of the original promotional flyer: 120 0 false 18 pt 18 pt 0 0 false false false Neck angle, is 3.8 degrees not 4.5-5 degrees. Changing the neck angle, and the angle of bridge, sustain is also improved. By changing slightly pickup at bridge, at front pickups and neck gap narrows between the bridge and the bridge, making closer to vintage Les Paul specifications; And jacaranda (Brazilian rosewood) is also what to say now is very valuable and useful finger plate, change to the Delrin nut nut. Choice was rock hard maple body top material. More than trace limit raised to these are all vintage Les Paul, design and manufacturing is no exaggeration to say exactly original Les Paul sound revived in modern times, has been! Body: Flamed Hard Maple 3A Honduras Mahogany One Piece Back Neck: Mahogany One Piece Finger Board: Jacaranda RADIUS: 300 R Frets: 22 F # 213 Scale: 625/312.5mm Bridge HLS-VB Bridge HLS-VT Aluminum Tailpiece Nut (width): Delrin(43.0mm) Inlay: Dish Pickups: Hibiki wound Controls: 2 V., 2., 3-way Toggle SW Finish: ALL Lacquer I will carefully pack this guitar so that it arrives in one in excellent condition. Please check my feedback. Bid with confidence, I am an honest man. Guitar will be shipped within 2 business days of payment. Sorry, no trades and I will not end my auctions early. Please check my other auctions. Happy bidding.
Title: Tokai hls420 hls-420 Hibiki Music Love Rock
Subtitle: Very rare Hibiki music commissioned HLS 420
ConditionDescription: Very good condition with very light wear
